channel.title: A reminder
channel.description:
[b][i]I like to remind of everybody of rule 12[/i][/b]
Rule 12: We never have misleading links in our signatures or posts. If your signature or posts says www.google.com, we expect it to take us to google.com.
[i]That means [b]NO[/b] misleading URL's. Alot of people have this 'MindDistortion' stuff in their signature, take it out please.[/i] -Killah™

item.title: A reminder
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

I like to remind of everybody of rule 12

Rule 12: We never have misleading links in our signatures or posts. If your signature or posts says www.google.com, we expect it to take us to google.com.

That means NO misleading URL’s.
Alot of people have this ‘MindDistortion’ stuff in their signature, take it out please.

-Killah™
